text: Esrom is an unincorporated community in Barton County, in the U.S. state of Missouri. ==History== A post office called Esrom was established in 1880, and remained in operation until 1904. The name Esrom appears to be biblical in origin. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Barton County, Missouri Category:Unincorporated communities in Missouri
title: Esrom, Missouri
